text:
My ice cream, thank you! Oh, delicious. I
really like ice cream.

Hello boys and girls. Hi. Hey, look! What´s
this? Yeah! It´s ice cream. It´s my ice

cream. Yeah!
Oh, I like ice cream! Hey, why don´t you

say it with me and rub your tummies. What
is it? It´s ice cream. And again. It´s ice

cream. One more time. It´s ice cream. Yeah!
Oh, delicious!

Hey! Where is 
my ice cream? Oh, I want an ice cream. Oh
no! And the ice cream van is gone. Oh, hey!

Wait a minute. Look! There is a sweet shop.
Maybe I can get some chocolate. Hahaha!

Thank you! Bye-bye. Hey, look. What have I
got? It´s chocolate. Yeah! Oh, delicious.

Hey! Where is my chocolate? Oh, what´s going
on? No ice cream, no chocolate. Oh, look!

A cake shop! Ok, one last try! I am going
to get some cake.

Thank you! Hey, look. What have I got now?
Yeah! Cake. Haha! I like cake. Great! Ok.

Wait a minute. Hey! Where is my cake? Oh,
look! What´s that? Crumbs. Cake crumbs. I

am going to find my cake. Crumbs. Cake crumbs.
Cake crumbs everywhere. Oh, listen. What´s

that noise?
A-ha, Maggie! It was you!

Yes! But now my tummy hurts.
I am sure your tummy hurts. With my ice cream…

Yeah.
…and my cake in your tummy!

Yeah.
Maggie, you naughty, naughty bird!

Sorry!
Bye-bye. See you next time.
